EmailTemplate.name: OpenStack Webinar Customer.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar - OpenStack Challenges and Advantages
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-webinar-2015-cust&utm_content=05192015> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, A fundamental shift in IT is almost upon us – and OpenStack is leading the way. Join Eric Wright and Kenneth Hui on Wednesday May 27th at 1:00 PM EST <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-webinar-2015-cust&utm_content=05192015> as they discuss the OpenStack Summit, and how OpenStack and open source ecosystems are becoming a powerful part of today's enterprise environments. Straight off of the 11th release of OpenStack (Kilo) we will be discussing the challenges and advantages of this fast growing open cloud environment. You won't want to miss this one! On top of this webinar we also want to give you our latest free e-Book OpenStack for Enterprise - The Tipping Point Cometh. <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/OpenStack-for-Enterprise-eBook-VMTurbo.pdf> In here you'll find:
- A brief history of OpenStack - OpenStack releases, programs and their roles - How some of the biggest companies are adopting and using OpenStack - And much more…
See you on the webinar! Best, - Your Dedicated Customer Experience Team <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-webinar-2015-cust&utm_content=05192015>
